name: FusePump
tag_list: ecommerce, product-feeds, data-feeds, ppc-automation, affiliate-marketing, google-shopping, dynamic-advertising, comparison-shopping-engines, social-media, f-commerce, mobile-commerce-
overview:
FusePump aim to make multi-channel e-commerce simple and profitable for their clients. FusePump creates, manages and integrates product data feeds, containing their clients product inventories, into online marketing channels. High-quality product feeds help increase product distribution and visibility in online marketing channels. They enable consumers to find exactly what the are searching for. Product feeds also help to simplify the online channel marketing proposition from a clients perspective. FusePump extract product data directly from e-commerce websites, ensuring that it is always up to date. FusePump provides an end-to-end service, meaning our technology does not demand any technical knowledge or management time on the part of our clients.

FusePump have developed multi-channel marketing platforms and e-commerce affiliate marketing tools that enable effective advertising and control of product content in channel marketing. The multi channel marketing platform MCMP and Performance Marketing Hub are recent examples.

We also partner with affiliate networks, digital marketing agencies and publishers, serving clients in the retail, travel, mobile and entertainment sectors including Argos, John Lewis, Tesco Direct, lastminute.com, Orange and Sky. FusePump is experienced in the following channels: Affiliate Marketing, Google Paid Search, Markteplaces Integration - Amazon, eBay etc Google Shopping, Dynamic Advertising, Comparison Shopping Engines, PPC Automation, Social Media and Mobile Commerce.
